it's standard rom with removed 'sense' ;} and changed start menu links. ..anyway my cache is quite big for mobile, about ~1GB data in sd card(4GB total capacity), tiles are loading quite well, sqlite rocks!. If you found any improvements please share ;}

I don't understand prefetcher.

ps.

i use gmap.net with my application but map does not show up.

if i used 'desktop demo using prefetcher', does map show up?

downloading tiles directly from mobile is quite slow, so we need a cache, so we make it using desktop demos, they have integrated tile downloader. After prefetch complete, copy map cache to your sd card. done ;} You also can run optimizations command using http://www.yunqa.de/delphi/doku.php/products/sqlitespy/index before putting file on mobile.

if you want that cache file will be created automatically, on first run set mode to ServerAndCache. Run in debug mode, track whats happening. Then replace that file with your desktop version and run again. It should work, did you try deploy mobile demo and debug it on your device?
